ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: On one day I might have one opinion of my sexual orientation and on another day I might have a different opinion.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel as though my sexual orientation is different depending on whom I am with.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My views of my sexual orientation change rapidly or unpredictably.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I feel that my sexual orientation is not really what it appears to be.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When I think about my sexuality in the past, I'm not sure what my sexual orientation was really.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My beliefs and actions regarding my sexual orientation often seem contradictory.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: If I were asked to describe my sexual orientation, my description might end up being different from one day to another day.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My beliefs about my sexual orientation often conflict with one another.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Even if I wanted to, I don't think I could tell someone what my sexual orientation is really like.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is often hard for me to make up my mind about my sexual orientation because I don't really know.
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Disagree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Strongly agree
Average of items ssa1, ssa2, ssa3, ssa4, ssa5, ssa6, ssa7, ssa8, ssa9, ssa10
